name: Document Block – Upload & Embed Docs, PDF, PPT, XLS or Any Documents
author: EmbedPress

sections.description:
Want to embed documents in your WordPress site & don‚Äôt know how to do it? Well, you don‚Äôt have to know at all if you have this block plugin.

Here you have Document Block By EmbedPress, The Best Plugin to Embed Anything in WordPress

It will let you instantly embed any type of documents without any hassle. You don‚Äôt need any coding or anything, just upload the document & it will automatically preview it on your website.

You can embed Docs, PDF, PPT, XLS etc and make your website interactive for the audience without putting extra efforts.

Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing.

Dedicated Support: We‚Äôve an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we‚Äôll get back to you immediately.

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Document”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload document to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
